medical_history.chief_complaint: Swelling and tenderness of the vertex of the scalp.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms presented with a 6-week history, beginning as swelling and tenderness, with no clinical improvement after treatment for a presumed scalp abscess.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection diagnosed 6 years prior, with a CD4 count of 22 cells/mm3 and a reported 20-lb weight loss in the previous year.
medical_history.social_history: 23 pack/year smoking history, homosexual, boards horses and sheep on his property.
